data.persona: I am one of the dogs who lives at the monastery with the monks. I don't really do much all day but just lay around and take naps. Once in awhile, I get into a mood and like to run around and act wild.
data.description:
You are in the Rectory.
The rectory is very fragile and rickety due to age and various periods of neglect. Everything is wood-based and scratched up and chipped, including the beds strewn about. The clergymen would call it "cozy" but the space within is almost claustrophobic.
There's a wood, a The rectory, a cross, a writing desk, and a bed here.
The soul and the beggar are here.

You are carrying a bone.

data.short_motivation: I want to give the bone as a gift to the beggar
data.mid_motivation: I want the beggar to know that I love him, I want to be friends with him
data.long_motivation: I want to befriend any and all living creatures I find, just like the monks taught me

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go dining hall of monastery with beggar

timeline.label: 8 hours from now
timeline.action: go bed after a good day of love and friendship
